resources.string: https://world.openfoodfacts.org/
https://world.openfoodfacts.org/contribute
https://world.openfoodfacts.org/discover
https://world.openfoodfacts.org/product/
https://world.openfoodfacts.org/contributor/
Open Food Facts 是一個食品的開發資料庫，它提供食品的營養成份、原料、配料、過敏原、…等資訊。這些資訊的來源全來自於產品本身的外包裝，
Contribute to Food transparency
Scan products, take them in picture, make food transparency happen
Get the facts
Extensive information about the product you\'ve scanned, deciphered for you
Get the Nutriscore
A synthetic view of the nutritional properties of your favorite food products
Works offline
You can add new products, even if you don\'t have an Internet connection right now
您掃描的產品尚未登錄於 Open Food Facts。請新增它。
您掃描的產品已存在於 Open Food Facts 中。
於 Open Food Facts 上查看此產品：
Books are not currently supported by Open Food Facts
- broadening your search \n- scan and add it to Open Food Facts
Click here to donate to Open Food Facts
Help translate Open Food Facts
Bring the Open Food Facts database to your language - no technical knowledge required
在離線狀態下，您可以掃描產品並稍候將它們加到 Open Food Facts。所有您掃描過的產品都會出現在這裡，您可以使用下面的按鈕來傳送它們。

Your allergies info will never be sent to the Open Food Facts server. Also, be careful that product data may not be accurate, and detection might not be 100% accurate, so please double-check by yourself!
